statements: UPDATE EnergyConsumptionData SET energy_usage = 100 WHERE timestamp = '2022-01-01 08:00:00';

UPDATE EnergyConsumptionData SET energy_usage = energy_usage + 100 WHERE location_id = 'c5a0f090-2603-46c0-8c0e-1f7b808cb128';
UPDATE EnergyConsumptionData SET energy_usage = energy_usage * 1.1 WHERE timestamp >= '2023-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2023-02-01';
UPDATE EnergyConsumptionData SET energy_usage = energy_usage - 50 WHERE location_id IN ('c5a0f090-2603-46c0-8c0e-1f7b808cb128', 'd7f4a89f-41b5-4910-a3ec-0cf5d4260323') AND timestamp < '2023-03-01';

UPDATE energy_consumption_data SET energy_reading = energy_reading * 1.1 WHERE datetime BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
